name: PresentationConnection
description: The PresentationConnection interface of the Presentation API provides methods and properties for managing a single presentation. Each presentation connection is represented by a PresentationConnection object. Both the controlling user agent and receiving user agent MUST implement PresentationConnection.

members.name: PresentationConnection.binaryType
members.description: Returns either blob or arrayBuffer. When a PresentationConnection object is created, its binaryType IDL attribute MUST be set to the string " arraybuffer".

members.name: PresentationConnection.state
members.description: Returns the presentation connection's current state.

members.name: PresentationConnection.url
members.description: Returns the URL used to create or reconnect to the presentation.

members.name: PresentationConnection.onclose
members.description: Fired when there is a call to PresentationConnection.close().

members.name: PresentationConnection.onconnect
members.description: Fired when a presentation connection is established.

members.name: PresentationConnection.onmessage
members.description: Fired when there is a call to PresentationConnection.send().

members.name: PresentationConnection.onterminated
members.description: Fired when there is a call to PresentationConnection.terminate().

members.name: PresentationConnection.close()
members.description: Closes the current connection and sends a PresentationConnectionCloseEvent to PresentationConnection.onclosed.

members.name: PresentationConnection.send()
members.description: Sends either binary or text data between a controlling browsing context and a presenting browsing context.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data to send to the presentation. It will be one of the following: String Blob Array

members.name: PresentationConnection.terminate()
members.description: Terminates the current connection and fires PresentationConnection.onterminated.
